prototypes.prototype: .GetItem as L (BYREF Data as C, BYREF ContentType as C, TargetPath as C)
.GetItem as L (BYREF Data as B, BYREF ContentType as C, TargetPath as C)

argument.name: BYREF Data
argument.description: The data variable where content is set.

argument.name: BYREF ContentType
argument.description: The content type for the data.

page.description: Retrieves an item from the container using the provided name. The content type is also returned.
page.discussion: You must DIM the resulting Data variable and contentType variable before making the call.
page.example:
dim ResultData as B dim ContentType as C dim Container as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(Container, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';")
? CallResult.Success = .T.
? Container.GetItem(ResultData, ContentType, "MyFile.jpg") = .T.
